bibl.bibl: [Butler, Samuel.] 1872a. Erewhon, or, Over the range. London: Trübner.
bibl.idno: https://archive.org/details/ErewhonOverrang00Butl/page/iii Inferred! see letter from Sam Butler, 30 May 1872. I’m not sure whether catalogues are to be trusted on whether the author’s name is actually on the book or not. CUL’s copies are 8001.d.44 (4th ed), Lib.7.87.25 (?), Keynes.M.1. 13 (2d ed).
